name: Better Opinions
headline: Prediction market of India
description:
Better Opinions is a prediction market of India which allows users to trade their opinion on everyday topics. For example, If you think India Covid cases will decrease by 10% this week, you can trade this insight and win money if correct.

Our aim is to make the app inclusive for all. The stock market unfortunately can be very technical and opaque and therefore isn’t always accessible for all. However, when we start allowing trading in categories such as cricket, politics and entertainment, not only do we make trading more relatable, but we also help improve their financial literacy.

founders.name: SAMAY JAIN, Founder
founders.description: I am an IIT Kharagpur graduate who worked with Gojek as a Product Lead for over 2 years. I have a penchant for trading, and has been an active trader in the markets for over 3 years now. It was this passion for trading that I wanted to make trading more accessible, and with this in mind, Better Opinions was born.

founders.name: Soumyajit Das, Founder
founders.description: I am Co-Founder and CTO of Better Opinions. Previously I had stints with Gojek, PayTm, Meesho, Decathlon and I come with over 5.5 years of experience as a software engineer. I am a huge football nerd, and loves the sport to death. I have worked as full stack engineer and also have a youtube channel for front end development. Previously, I have built a social startup for donating household items, books, cloths, etc for charity.

### How It Works
![Choose an Event](https://betteropinions.in/static/website/images/step1.svg) ![Predict an outcome](https://betteropinions.in/static/website/images/step2.svg) ![Match](https://betteropinions.in/static/website/images/step3.svg) ![Trade Executed](https://betteropinions.in/static/website/images/step4.svg)
![Calendar Icon](https://betteropinions.in/static/website/images/calendar-bg.svg)
#### Choose an Event
Click on the event to choose the event of your choice. You can select different categories or choose an event from the feed 
![Pie Chart Icon](https://betteropinions.in/static/website/images/pie-chart-bg.svg)
#### Predict the Outcome
You can predict the outcome as Yes or No. The prices mentioned in the boxes are the current prices which you need to pay to play. You can also bid for another price by clicking on “Place an Opinion” on the bottom of the screen. 
![Alert Icon](https://betteropinions.in/static/website/images/alert-circle-bg.svg)
#### We will help find a match
If you have predicted the outcome as ‘Yes’, we will find a user who has predicted ‘No’ at a complementary price, and vice versa. 
![Trending Icon](https://betteropinions.in/static/website/images/trending-up-bg.svg)
#### Trade Executed
We will match your prediction with a complementary prediction. For eg., if you predict ‘Yes’ for 60 coins, we will match it with a user who bids ‘No’ for 40 coins on the same event. Whoever predicts rights wins 100 coins. 
### What happens on Better Opinions?
  * #### Trade
Trade on events by setting your own price. Hedge and show off what your trading skills are like. 
  * #### Train
We help you with stats and facts to help you train your trading skills. Behtar seekho, behtar karo. 
  * #### Profit
You trade with money, and smart trading can mean you walk away with profits.

**Better Opinions: A Brief Overview**

Better Opinions was founded in 2021 and aimed to establish itself as India's innovative prediction market, allowing users to trade on everyday topics. The premise was simple yet engaging: if you believed that COVID-19 cases in India would drop by 10% in a week, you could stake that opinion and potentially earn money if you were right. This approach aimed to democratize trading away from the technical complexities of the stock market and make it more accessible to a broader audience. The platform allowed users to trade in various relatable categories, such as cricket, politics, and entertainment, fostering not just trading but also enhancing financial literacy among users.

Located in Gurugram, India, the company was part of Y Combinator's W22 batch and had a small team of 12 employees. Its mission was clear: to empower everyone to express and monetize their opinions in a fun and engaging way. With over 150,000 active users and more than 600,000 sign-ups, it seemed to be on a promising trajectory, attracting interest and raising over $1 million in pre-seed funding from notable investors.

However, in a significant turn of events, Better Opinions ceased operations on September 30, 2023, due to unspecified business reasons. Despite shutting down, the company reassured users that their ability to withdraw funds from the app would remain unaffected.

**Key Facts:**
- **Mission:** Prediction market for India, enabling users to trade opinions on various topics.
- **Founded:** 2021
- **Location:** Gurugram, India
- **Team Size:** 12 employees
- **Users:** 150K+ active users, 600K+ sign-ups
- **Funding:** Over $1 million raised in pre-seed funding
- **Current Status:** Ceased operations on September 30, 2023

For more information and updates, check their website at [betteropinions.in](https://betteropinions.in/).
